繋ぐ: (つなぐ) - to tie; to fasten; to connect; to transfer (phone call)
繋げる: (つなげる) - to tie; to fasten; to connect; to transfer (phone call)
繋争: (けいそう) - contention; dispute; conflict; controversy
繋属: (けいぞく) - relationship/connection/affiliation; pending (e.g. legal case)/pendency
繋累: (けいるい) - dependents/family members that one has to support; encumbrances/things that tie one down
繋駕: (けいが) - harnessing (a horse to a cart, esp. for a race)
繋駕競走: (けいがきょうそう) - harness racing
繋駕速歩競走: (けいがはやあしきょうそう) - harness racing
織りあげる: (おりあげる) - to weave up into fabric
織り上げる: (おりあげる) - to weave up into fabric
織り交ざる: (おりまざる) - to interlace; to interweave
織り交ぜる: (おりまぜる) - to weave together; to interweave; to intermingle
織り出す: (おりだす) - to weave a pattern; to begin to weave
織り女: (おりめ) - female weaver; (しょくじょ only) {astron}  Vega (star in the constellation Lyra)/Alpha Lyrae
織り姫: (おりひめ) - woman textile worker; {astron}  Vega (bright star in the constellation Lyra)/Alpha Lyrae
織り模様: (おりもよう) - woven pattern or design
織り目: (おりめ) - texture; space between threads (i.e. in cloth)
織り色: (おりいろ) - color of woven fabric; colour of woven fabric
織り込み: (おりこみ) - weaving into; incorporation; factoring in
織り込み済み: (おりこみずみ) - taking something into consideration; making allowances; discounting
織り込む: (おりこむ) - to weave into; to interweave; to be incorporated in; to be factored in
織交ぜる: (おりまぜる) - to weave together; to interweave; to intermingle
織女: (たなばたつめ) - female weaver; {astron}  Vega (star in the constellation Lyra)/Alpha Lyrae
織女星: (しょくじょせい) - {astron}  Vega (star in the constellation Lyra); Alpha Lyrae
織姫: (おりひめ) - woman textile worker; {astron}  Vega (bright star in the constellation Lyra)/Alpha Lyrae
織物の耳: (おりもののみみ) - selvedge (non-fray machined edge of fabrics); selvage
織目: (おりめ) - texture; space between threads (i.e. in cloth)
織豊時代: (しょくほうじだい) - Shokuho period (i.e. the Azuchi-Momoyama period, approx. 1568-1600 CE)
織込み: (おりこみ) - weaving into; incorporation; factoring in
織込む: (おりこむ) - to weave into; to interweave; to be incorporated in; to be factored in
繕い立てる: (つくろいたてる) - to put up a good front
繕う: (つくろう) - to mend/to patch up/to repair/to fix/to darn/to trim; to fix (hair, clothes, appearance etc.)/to adjust/to tidy up/to groom; to keep up appearances/to cover up (mistakes etc.)/to gloss over; to treat (illness, injury, etc.)
繖形花序: (さんけいかじょ) - umbellate inflorescence; umbel (i.e. flower with a large number of flowers growing radially from a common center)
繖房花序: (さんぼうかじょ) - corymbose inflorescence; corymb
繙く: (ひもとく) - to peruse (a book); to untie a scroll
繚乱: (りょうらん) - profusely (esp. flowers blooming in great profusion)
繧繝: (うげん) - method of dying in which a color repeatedly goes from dense to diffuse, diffuse to dense - imported from western China and used in Buddhist pictures, temple ornaments, etc., during the Nara and Heian periods
繩張り: (なわばり) - roping off/stretching rope/demarcation; one's turf/domain/territory/sphere of influence
繩目: (なわめ) - knot (in rope, etc.)/bonds/fetters; arrest; rope impressions (on the surface of pottery)
繭をかける: (まゆをかける) - to spin a cocoon
繭を掛ける: (まゆをかける) - to spin a cocoon
繭玉: (まゆだま) - New Year's decoration with cocoon-shaped cakes
繰りかえす: (くりかえす) - to repeat; to do something over again
繰り上がり: (くりあがり) - increase in digit (e.g. if we add 2 to the number 9)
繰り上がる: (くりあがる) - (ant: 繰り下がる・1) to move up (e.g. date, rank, order)/to be advanced; to be carried (of a number in addition)
繰り上げる: (くりあげる) - to move up; to advance
繰り上げ当選: (くりあげとうせん) - win an election due to another's death or disqualification
繰り上る: (くりあがる) - (ant: 繰り下がる・1) to move up (e.g. date, rank, order)/to be advanced; to be carried (of a number in addition)
繰り下がる: (くりさがる) - (ant: 繰り上がる・くりあがる・1) to be moved back (e.g. date, rank, order)/to be postponed; to be borrowed (of a number in subtraction)
繰り下げ: (くりさげ) - postponement; deferment; moving down
繰り下げる: (くりさげる) - to defer; to postpone; to move down
繰り下る: (くりさがる) - (ant: 繰り上がる・くりあがる・1) to be moved back (e.g. date, rank, order)/to be postponed; to be borrowed (of a number in subtraction)
繰り入れ: (くりいれ) - inward transfer (of money); carry over (money from previous period)
繰り入れる: (くりいれる) - to transfer (esp. money in)/to add (esp. money to an account); to reel in (e.g. net, fishing line)
繰り出しユニット: (くりだしユニット) - feed unit
繰り出し梯子: (くりだしばしご) - extension ladder; aerial ladder
繰り出す: (kuridasu) - to draw (a thread), to let out (ex.: uma corda); to head out as a group, to set out in large numbers, to flock, to sally forth , to draw (a thread), to let out (e.g. a rope); to head out as a group, to set out in large numbers, to flock, to sally forth; to send out one after another, to dispatch; to lunge, to unleash
繰り合せる: (くりあわせる) - to arrange; to manage (to find time)
繰り合わす: (くりあわす) - to make time; to arrange matters
繰り合わせる: (くりあわせる) - to arrange; to manage (to find time)
繰り広げる: (くりひろげる) - to unfold; to unroll; to open
